meaningMnemonic: Remember how you learned that 紳士 means "gentleman?" Well when two men <kanji>determine</kanji> that the best thing to do is <kanji>cooperate</kanji> they form a <vocabulary>gentlemen's agreement</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
